post.body: One of my favorite sayings...lol
Yes m'am - heading to club bed with dj pillow just now. :)
Steal away girlie, they are on FB too. Do as you please. :)
LMAO don't even get me started. Check my FB album, I wrote that just for Christopher...lol
Where do we get to see your pix sir?
LOL Alright girlie. You guys get home safe. :)
Why aren't you on FB lady? I have Elliott but not you...
You still awake hun? Geeze...thought you would be out by now. :)
Sounds good, hear ya later.
LOL She's too much.
Even though she wasn't twisted as yet, but still couldn't SPELL it - I won't fault her. Only for today...lol
Oh I KNOW you don't even know if you coming or going at this point...shiiiit...lol
You KNOW the pic of them shoes will be up TOMORROW. :) Da hotness right there. How the feet feel?...lol
I am curious to know where the Tweet went....LOL
Awww ***black woman blushin'" Thx girl. Hope to cultivate next semester. I want to see some of your pics when I come down! :)
I had no idea that Chipotle was owned by McPurge, twas a shock to my system. But I love it soooo.
I second that emotion. Shit...want some now. THANKS.
Girl, I am not even looking at my ass until Jan 5th when I hit the gym! Until then -EAT ON!!...lol Enjoy one for me!
How was Christmas girlie?
And I just broke a nail. :( My day has begun with Disturbia and will continue with movies from my covers for the day.
Mmmmm sounds divine. Warm and gooey...lovely.
Hey lady! I totally understand about the delay - I just cancelled all my plans because of the skating rink outside.
I love how you added in mostly in brackets...LOL
YUP. Eric B & Rakim What's On Your Mind is mine. Still play the damn soundtrack like I purchased it yesterday.
Favorite track on the album?
Your boyfriend is a serious bad man...lol Yessir. Them crabs are boldface aren't they? Jokes!
Wow...I would try anything once myself, but certainly NOT that. Just thinking about the shell and ting...ewwww...
Wheeeyyyy...lol Naah man. That is something we don't do in St. Lucia. My mom was like HUH?...LOL
Yes girl, 2 hams fo sho! :) What do you guys call tattoo? You know how it's one thing there and another somewhere else.
OK. SERIOUSLY. Ah gone now...lol Gnite y'all.
Well since y'all are still awake, here are the pix I took. http://www.flickr.com/photos/thaconnoisseur/sets/72157611384305064/
Twitter I am out. Hear y'all later.
Oye Twitter...what's shakin?
Alright y'all. Going to get ready for @_huny's shindig, then off to Sol Village. I. Don't. Stop.
Alright y'all, my Twitter day pass has expired. I am off to have a movie day. See y'all later, have a good one. :)
What's up Twitter fam? Been away for a day, thought I would pass and see what's up. How goes the family and food time?
Just passing through Twitts - hope everyone enjoyed yesterday's festivities. I am on day two with likka in hand. Lates!! :)
Alright y'all, going to do the cheesecake and head to bed. Hear y'all later.
It's 12:02 am - MERRY CHRISTMAS Y'ALL. Stay blessed and divinely favored.
Apple pie is out of the oven. Next up, ze cherry cheesecake a le Connoisseur. :)
